import React, { Component } from "react"; import { Alert, Button, Col, Form, Row, Spinner, Container, } from "react-bootstrap"; const labelStyle = { color: "white", backgroundColor: "#8B0000", fontSize: 20, fontFamily: "Arial", borderRadius: 5, }; class Registration extends Component { state = { registration: { name: "", surname: "", email: "", password: "", birth: "", address: "", city: "", postalCode: "", creditCard: "", }, errMessage: "", loading: false, }; updateRegistrationField = (e) => { let registration = { ...this.state.registration }; let currentId = e.currentTarget.id; registration[currentId] = e.currentTarget.value; this.setState({ registration: registration }); }; submitRegistration = async (e) => { e.preventDefault(); this.setState({ loading: true }); alert("You are submitting " + this.state.name); this.props.history.push( "/RegistrationData?" + this.state.registration.name ); }; render() { return (
{this.state.errMessage && ( We encountered a problem with your request {this.state.errMessage} )} {this.state.loading && (
Preparing the Form, please wait
)}
Name Surname Email Password Birth Date Adress City Postal Code Credit Card
); } } export default Registration;
